{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WR841N |revision=v13.x |series=N300 |asin=B0019EQ1RW,B001FWYGJS |newegg=N82E16833704039 |fcc_date=12/01/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7WR841NV13 |pcb_id=2050500850 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628NN |cpu1_cspeed=575 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q64CSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M14D5121632A-2.5B |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628NN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink 4.3.0.0; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-LINK_XXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=18:D6:C7,D4:6E:0E,F4:F2:6D,C4:71:54 |oui_eth=18:D6:C7,D4:6E:0E,F4:F2:6D,C4:71:54 }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wireless N Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WR841N.html Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.tp-link.com/en/download/TL-WR841N_V13.html Support page]
"2050500850" and "1642" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3214016 FCC photos]. :"TL-WR841N(TPD) Ver:13.0" is silkscreened on the sticker. {{see also|TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4|TP-LINK TL-WR841HP}}
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=70687 ''OpenWrt on TL-WR841N v13 or TL-WR840N v4'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] :<small>'''Note''': TL-WR840N v4 have 5 leds: power, wifi, lan (one led for all ports), wan, lock(wps). :::TL-WR841N v13 have 8 leds: power, wifi, lan4, lan3, lan2, lan1, wan, lock(wps).</small> :[https://github.com/lede-project/source/pull/974/commits/8706b608f4848940275cdb523e6bb85705769728 ''ramips: add initial support for TP-LINK TL-WR840N v4''] :Specification: :- SoC: MediaTek MT7628NN (580MHz) :- RAM: 64 MiB (Winbond W9751G6JB-25) :- Flash: 8 MiB (GigaDevice GD25Q64CSIG) :- LAN: 4x 100M, WAN: 1x 100M :A firmware update TL-WR841N(EU)_V13_170622 from 07/07/17 :Add New features/enhancement: :1. Add Access Point/Repeater/WISP mode. :2. Add IPTV function. :3. Add auto reboot function. *[https://forum.freifunk.net/t/tp-link-tl-wr841n-v13-wird-in-de-ausgeliefert/14289 On '''FreiFunk''' forums]
